Pre-Game Insights: The GFA has announced free entry for fans at the Baba Yara Sports Stadium for the Ghana vs Namibia friendly match.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match will not be open to streaming or broadcasting on TV and social media.
Others: The Ghana vs Namibia friendly match is a crucial preparation for the upcoming 2023 Africa Cup of Nations (AFCON) tournament in Ivory Coast.
Notable Headlines: Ghana vs Namibia friendly match will not be streamed on TV - GFA
